channel.title: RuneScape TaT: Shadow of the Storm
channel.description:
Basically I was wondering if anyone could tell me the [b]T[/b]ricks [b]a[/b]nd [b]T[/b]rades of killing the level 101, on "Shadow of Storm" quest, as i'm only level 38 with;
55 range 43 hp 30 attack 40 strenghth
I need to know how to kill it, because i'm having doubts about killing it with range -might die-
-Quest complete- with only 1 shark left I killed the level 100 and I now have my Mithril Gloves - yippy - !
Regards, James.

item.title: RuneScape TaT: Shadow of the Storm
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

He only hit’s 10’s? and, I really need this quest done because then i’ll be able to my mith gloves :).
I’ll give him a try.

I’ve actually never done the quest, but I think it might be possible if you have enough food, considering he can max 110 with melee or 100 with magic.
